sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Gungcho is a fast-paced platformer designed for LED matrix displays, where speed and precision are key.

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
- Platforming gameplay
- Real-time rendering on LED matrix
- Unique visual style

sections.title: Hardware Used
sections.content:
- Raspberry Pi 4 Model B
- 64x64 RGB LED Matrix Panel

sections.title: How it Works
sections.content: Gungcho streams game frames to the LED matrix using a Node.js backend and the `node-pixel-pusher` library.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content: Gungcho brings classic platforming to a new, low-res medium, blending retro gameplay with modern hardware.
